name: Project Sapphire (Public Beta)
description:
This is the public beta for Project Sapphire, The community's platformer. New releases will be released for every slightly buggy version of Canary. If you wish to join canary, You need to apply for canary at this link.

People may Provide suggestions as well as viewing the website at this link.

The following are release notes for v0.2.2 Beta 1 Build 4:

Please Note: The 64 bit version takes up a lot of memory on boot and is very slow to start. The 32 bit works on 64 bit systems, and is faster to boot, but the 64 bit version has smoother gameplay.

Introducing: Barry:

Barry is a bee. you may have heard of Barry before, from a movie... maybe. He is a flying enemy that is introduced in level 3. Any contact with Barry will make you lose a life. When Barry is directly over your head, he will start flying more irradicably and descending until he makes contact with you. You will have to dodge Barry to move on to the next level... there isn't one yet.

Boxes now give items only available in the store. They become active as soon as obtained

Jetpack:

Available through item boxes. Allows the Player to jump higher.

A new .EXE installer for Windows 32 and 64 bit:

Don't worry, the EXE installer doesn't require admin.

Smoother Camera:

This did affect the animations, so I disabled the until the next bug fix update.

Thank you for joining the public beta, and I hope to see suggestions soon!
